text:
There actually is but you have to jump though a few hoops if you install this from the market place <https://app.HubSpot.com/marketplace/59252/products/HubSpot/html>
and then look at it in the design manager there’s a a html field (though you can’t edit it). You can however clone the module and add other fields around it.
The other option is to log in to ftp and find the json file for your module and add it in there, (i’ve created a text field before with all the settings i wanted then changed it to html in the json file
I'm happy to add you to the beta if you're interested! Just let me know.

Can we please get the UI fixed for simple menus in the page editor? <https://spin.d.pr/orvSpA+>

It’s been like this for what 7 months now?

I’m honestly embarassed when I tell clients to use the module or use a menu field in a custom module because it looks broken, and from the client’s perspective they assume I caused it.

but it’s still better than me rebuilding the menu UI in a custom module…
I've ditched use of simple menus, custom seem a better and more useful solution to me.
Not to mean that this shouldn't be updated
